"step_by_step_thinking": "From the given documents, we can see that time-dependent deformation is a characteristic of some materials. In 'Time-dependent deformation of some direct compression excipients', it was found that Sta-Rx compacts exhibited time-dependent deformation in diametral compression tests. This suggests that if the rate of loading is decreased, the mechanical properties of these materials may change over time.

In 'Viscoelastic properties of elastomeric impression materials. This suggests that mechanical properties may change over time if the rate of loading is decreased.
